title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama – chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama – drop local Llama/Mistral models into any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-user support, model manager, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama – idiomatic fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET wrapper for Ollama – chat, embeddings, model management; includes Blazor demo.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama – concise DSL for chat, completions, and model ops.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with fuzzy-finder model picker and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration – use Ollama generators & embedders in production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tuning tips, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Lightweight React front-end for Ollama – no build step, single static HTML file.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples: CPU, NVIDIA, AMD ROCm, and OpenShift templates.

title: ollama-rag-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that creates a local RAG vault backed by Ollama embeddings & chat.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama – async HTTP, SSE streaming, and native binaries.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio & serde.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated Modelfile collection: code assistants, uncensored chat, function-calling, quantized mixes.
